title: Why league champions cant be balanced.
body:
Id like to say first off that i havent played league in 2 months i believe. and sorta dont want to come back, however. when it comes to balance, i thought of this..


**How can riot possibly balance champions when the one objective in the game cannot possibly give balance to anything?
**
This one objective is **DRAGON**. Its random. How can random drakes give feedback to riot in telling them what gives true W/R champions?

How can 3x infernal drakes to one side be considered balanced? Do you remember when the drake had fixed stats way back in season 6?
THAT is truly balanced.

come on... be reasonable. a step in the right direction is to look at drakes. 

little drunk right now, the information is there, just needs to be interpreted correctly.

> How can random drakes give feedback to riot in telling them what gives true W/R champions?

Look up what a statistically significant sample size is.

> little drunk right now, the information is there, just needs to be interpreted correctly.

It is, and you did not.

the issue is, if you think of league as a pool, the champs are the water, and riot is the filtration system that keep the water clean and level.

Riot add new champs, more water, but dosnt balence them, then they rework champs and they broken, all while older champs fall to the side, riot needs to increase its staff and fix whats brken and buff whats weak, they fail at their jobs so i dont spend money on them anymore
